content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Mr. Li. I am very interested in renting it out to you. However, I would like to discuss the rental price with you. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. Can you please tell me your price?
name: Bo Li from China

content: I apologize, but I am not able to provide you with the rental price of my apartment at this time. I would need to see your offer and negotiate with you to come to an agreement on the rental price. Is there a specific price range that you are interested in?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for a rental price of 500 Euros per month. Is that possible?

I am also looking for a long term rental agreement. 6 months or more.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord. Is it possible to negotiate a lower rental price?

I am a student. I am responsible and dependable. I do not have any utilities to pay.

I am looking for a 25 square meter apartment.

I would like to accept the rental price of 500 Euros per month.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Mr. Li. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I am open to discussing the rental price with you.

Based on the information you have provided, I am not able to accept your offer of 500 Euros per month for a 25 square meter apartment. However, I am willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial rental agreement.

I would like to propose a rental price of 600 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment. This price takes into account the value of the apartment and the expenses I incur in maintaining it.

In terms of a long term rental agreement, I am willing to negotiate a lease of 6 months or more. I believe that this is a fair and reasonable amount of time for both parties to commit to the rental agreement.

I understand that you are a student and do not have any utilities to pay. This is a positive factor for me as it means that you will be a reliable and responsible tenant.

I hope that we can come to an agreement on the rental price and rental terms that works for both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
